metadata.keywords: run, device, ps5, xbox, controller, iphone
metadata.description: Running your Haptic on a Device

title: Run on Device
body: When you want to test out your Haptic, pressing Run on Device will send the Haptic to a connected device so that you can quickly experience it

sections.title: iPhone
sections.text: To enable running device on the iPhone, you must either run the iOS Haptrix App, or use the Haptrix Sync Swift Package

sections.title: Game Controller Support
sections.text: We support both PlayStation 5 Dual Sense and Xbox Series X Controllers

sections.title: Mutli Device Testing
sections.text: If you have an iPhone, PS5 & Xbox controller connected to your macOS device, when you press Run on Device, all devices will play the Haptic at the same time.
